RPGGrid.actor
Class WorldObject

java.lang.Object
  RPGGrid.actor.Actor
      RPGGrid.actor.WorldObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
RPGGrid.actor.Interactive
public class WorldObject
extends RPGGrid.actor.Actor
implements RPGGrid.actor.Interactive

A WorldObject is an implementation of Interactive that provides a default interact method which does not do anything and is ideal for use as an obstacle for the player or a Interactive placeholder.

Author:
Sean MacLane
